pack.incompatible.confirm.old: This pack was made for an older version of Minecraft and may not work correctly.
pack.incompatible.confirm.new: This pack was made for a newer version of Minecraft and may not work correctly.
options.graphics.fast.tooltip:
"Fast" graphics reduces the amount of visible rain and snow.
Transparency effects are disabled for various blocks such as tree leaves.
advancements.story.shiny_gear.title: Cover Me with Diamonds
options.graphics.fabulous.tooltip:
"Fabulous" graphics enables screen shaders to draw translucent objects per-pixel.
This may severely impact performance for portable devices and 4K displays.
pack.dropConfirm: Do you want to add the following packs to Minecraft?
